page.title: 16Kettlesing Village School
page.content: The North Yorkshire County Primary School at Felliscliffe serves most of our block. Children in Menwith go to Darley School and in High Birstwith to Birstwith School. It has 28 pupils, two full-time teachers and one part-time teacher, and is housed in the old Victorian Board School, which now also incorporates the former schoolhouse, thus giving very spacious accomodation. Most pupils come from the surrounding area, though the local private sector attracts growing numbers. There is enthusiastic parental sup- port helping towards the aquisition of new equipment, e.g., computer and video. North Yorkshire has a strong policy of supporting small rural schools.
